pages.text: $(li)The Infinity enchantment can be applied in a $(l:patchouli:weapons/bow)Bow$(/l), $(l:patchouli:weapons/crossbow)Crossbow$(/l) and in a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/water_bucket)Water Bucket$(/l).$(br)$(li)This enchantment allows the bow to fire normal $(l:patchouli:weapons/arrows)Arrows$(/l) for free, but you will need to have at least one arrow in your inventory.
pages.title: Infinity

pages.text: $(li)A Water Bucket with this enchantment applied will never be empty.
